name: Ergoguys CST1550 Wired Trackball
Features: [Drag Lock lets you drag and drop without holding down a button, Scroll feature allows effortless scrolling on web pages and large documents, The precision ground ball and mirror finished rollers deliver If smooth as silk feel and effortless control, Dynamic gain feature allows you to accelerate the cursor exponentially as you roll the ball faster. Roll the ball slowly for single pixel accuracy]
